  • Method Details

    • addWorkspace

      @PostMapping(consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") @Secured({"ROLE_ADMIN","ROLE_COMPANY_MANAGER"}) @ResponseStatus(CREATED) WorkspaceResponseDTO addWorkspace(@PathVariable("headquartersId") Integer headquartersId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid CreateWorkspaceRequestDTO createRequest)

    • workspace

      @GetMapping(path="/{workspaceId}", produces="application/json") WorkspaceResponseDTO workspace(@PathVariable("headquartersId") Integer headquartersId, @PathVariable("workspaceId") Integer workspaceId)

    • workspaces

      @GetMapping(produces="application/json") List<WorkspaceResponseDTO> workspaces(@PathVariable("headquartersId") Integer headquartersId, @RequestParam("bookingDate") LocalDate bookingDate)

    • updateWorkspace

      @PutMapping(path="/{workspaceId}", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") @Secured({"ROLE_ADMIN","ROLE_COMPANY_MANAGER"}) WorkspaceResponseDTO updateWorkspace(@PathVariable("headquartersId") Integer headquartersId, @PathVariable("workspaceId") Integer workspaceId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UpdateWorkspaceRequestDTO updateRequest)

    • removeWorkspace

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{workspaceId}", produces="application/json") @Secured({"ROLE_ADMIN","ROLE_COMPANY_MANAGER"}) @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) void removeWorkspace(@PathVariable("headquartersId") Integer headquartersId, @PathVariable("workspaceId") Integer workspaceId)
